mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.product_id AS "productId", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.order_item_no AS "orderItemNo", a.product_name AS "productName", a.original_price AS "originalPrice", a.reality_price AS "realityPrice", a.sum_price AS "sumPrice", a.count AS "count", a.description AS "description", a.doctor_id AS "doctorId", a.standby1 AS "standby1", a.standby2 AS "standby2", a.delete_mark AS "deleteMark", a.remark AS "remark", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.mender AS "mender", a.creator AS "creator", a.create_date AS "createDate"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zhenghe_order_item( id, product_id, order_id, order_item_no, product_name, original_price, reality_price, sum_price, count, description, doctor_id, standby1, standby2, delete_mark, remark, update_date, mender, creator, create_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{productId}, #{orderId}, #{orderItemNo}, #{productName}, #{originalPrice}, #{realityPrice}, #{sumPrice}, #{count}, #{description}, #{doctorId}, #{standby1}, #{standby2}, #{deleteMark}, #{remark}, #{updateDate}, #{mender}, #{creator}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE zhenghe_order_item SET product_id = #{productId}, order_id = #{orderId}, order_item_no = #{orderItemNo}, product_name = #{productName}, original_price = #{originalPrice}, reality_price = #{realityPrice}, sum_price = #{sumPrice}, count = #{count}, description = #{description}, doctor_id = #{doctorId} WHERE id = #{id}
